subject: Hockey, Ice
DVD (Digital Versatile Disc)
Documentary Films and Programs
lead_paragraph: The documentary follows the Capitals star as he spends the summer of 2010 in Moscow, with trips to Las Vegas for the N.H.L. awards show and to Miami to shoot a hockey equipment commercial.
snippet: The documentary follows the Capitals star as he spends the summer of 2010 in Moscow, with trips to Las Vegas for the N.H.L. awards show and to Miami to shoot a hockey equipment commercial.
